content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakevipaiva.dfs.core.windows.net/files/labs-dp-203/02/data/2019.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) 
    WITH(
    SalesOrderNumber VARCHAR(10),
    SalesOrderLineNumber INT,
    OrderDate DATE,
    CustomerName VARCHAR(25),
    EmailAddress VARCHAR(50),
    Item VARCHAR(30),
    Quantity INT,
    UnitPrice DECIMAL(18,2),
    TaxAmount DECIMAL (18,2)
)
as result
